evidence.claim: NESA Solutions utilizes AWS for scalable cloud applications.
The company focuses on HIPAA compliance for health-tech applications.
NESA's platform supports various EDI transaction sets, including X12.
NESA implements FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare.
Azure is used for data storage and processing in their solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or API automation use cases found on their site.
